caption.center: IN RE: Barbara MORGAN, Arkansas Bar No. 87120

opinion.posture: Petition for voluntary surrender of law license. Petition granted.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon recommendation of the Supreme Court Committee on Professional Conduct, we hereby accept the voluntary surrender of the law license of Barbara Morgan of Little Rock, Arkansas, to practice law in the State of Arkansas. Ms. Morgan's name shall be removed from the registry of licensed attorneys, and she is barred and enjoined from engaging in the practice of law in this state.
It is so ordered.
